availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thaddeus Warsaw Minish (Owen County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Kentucky native. Son of Richard J. Minish and Louisa Rowlett Minish. Resident in Owen County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Owen County in 1860. Served in the 54th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry (U.S.A.) as private from October 9, 1864, to September 1, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 253A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owen County, District 1, p. 79.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 540.
